doc.title: Admiral Cervera and Officers of the Spanish Fleet Leaving the 'St. Louis'
doc.plot: "This picture was taken on the arrival of Admiral Cervera and the officers of the Spanish fleet at Annapolis, where they were held prisoners until the termination of the Spanish-American war. The picture shows them coming down the gang-plank, many of them severely wounded and scarcely able to walk. A very pathetic and interesting sight."
